metadata.dc:author: Ferrer, Jesús Morera
Oval, Carlos Díaz
Sánchez, Juana María
Hernández, Miguel Suárez
metadata.dc:description: A descriptive study was conducted to evaluate the outbreaks of the disease occurred in human beings and animals in the province of Ciego de Avila from 1980 to 2003. It was proved in this paper that the measures taken in animal health and public health have managed to reduce the frequency of outbreaks.
metadata.dc:title: Brotes de leptospirosis animal y humana en la provincia Ciego de Avila.
[Outbreaks of animal and human leptospirosis in the province of Ciego de Avila].
